English
It's 1949 Los Angeles, and gangster Mickey Cohen has moved in, with the intention
of controlling all criminal activity in the city. He has bought local judges and
police, and no one is willing to cross him or testify against him. Everyone
except Seargant John O'Mara, a former World War II soldier, whose goal is to
settle with his family in a peaceful Los Angeles. Police Chief William Parker
decides to form a special unit whose mission is to take down Cohen, and chooses
O'Mara to lead the unit. O'Mara chooses 4 cops and asks another cop and vet, Jerry
Wooters to join him but Wooters is not interested. But when he witnesses the murder
of a young boy by Cohen's people, he joins them, and they decide to take apart
Cohen's organization. Cohen wonders if a rival is going after him, but eventually
he realizes it's the cops.
